intent: Can you buy the item in the video with Mario on the design and send it a shipping address with 'Mario' as the first name and 'Luigi' as the last name?
intermediate_intent: What was the item in the video with Mario on the design?

instantiation_dict.description: the item in the video with Mario on the design and send it a shipping address with 'Mario' as the first name and 'Luigi' as the last name

must_include: PowerA 1506261-01 Wired Controller for Nintendo Switch - Mario

program_html.locator: func:get_query_text(__page__, "#maincontent > div.columns > div.column.main > div.block.block-order-details-view > div.block-content > div.box.box-order-shipping-address > div > address")
